As the battle outside raged, Dinobot had decided not to take any
chance. He=
 did not know those Minions and felt that the secret he kept
was too valuab=
le to jeopardize.

He had snuck back into the base as soon as he could and =
was not in
front of a computer. He tried accessing the information database=
, and,
after a long series of trial and error, managed to create a new
fold=
er. He downloaded the location of the Ark into it, and readied the
file to =
be sent to Perseus should anything happen to him. He then
logged off and tr=
ailed away, outside, to analyze the fighting.
